price: Rahman olan Allah'a karşı şu size yardım edecek askerleriniz hani kimlerdir? Kâfirler ancak boş bir gurur/aldanış içindedirler.
arabic: أَمَّنۡ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي هُوَ جُندٞ لَّكُمۡ يَنصُرُكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِۚ إِنِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ إِلَّا فِي غُرُورٍ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: amman hādhā alladhī huwa jundun lakum yanṣurukum min dūni al-raḥmāni ini al-kāfirūna illā fī ghurūrin
